data: Lawler, James E James E Lawler Arthur and Aurelia Schawlow Professor jelawler@wisc.edu (608) 262-2918 1334 Chamberlin Hall Atomic Physics Directions to room 1334, Chamberlin Hall Facing into the building at the Charter Street entrance on the 1st floor of Chamberlin Hall, enter the hallway ahead of you. Turn left. Follow the hallway to room 1334, which will be on your left. Research Groups Atomic, Molecular and Optical Physics Atomic, Molecular and Optical Physics The following groups in the Department of Physics conduct research on atomic, molecular and optical physics: Atom Trainers Atomic Collisions Quantum Physics with Atoms and Light Quantum Optics and Ultrafast Physics Please refer to their respective Web sites for more information.
